name: Tour Guide
description:
Tour Guide is a tiny but powerful plugin that turns any FigJam board into a slide show presentation! It’s simple and easy to use:


1. Select any object(s) and add them to your tour.

2. Tap the arrows to navigate your FigJam board.

3. Tap the X button to remove a view or the trash can to start from scratch.


With Tour Guide, you can screen share a FigJam board as if it were a slide deck, and quickly navigate to the highlights you’ve selected. No more need to scroll and hunt. 


Tour Guide is built with a little intelligence in the background. If you move objects, Tour Guide will continue to follow them around. If you delete objects, Tour Guide will remove them from the tour automatically.


I built this plugin so I could present FigJam boards easily, and welcome your feedback to make it even better for the future.
